price: 39. Alle Wuxuu tiraa wuxuu doono (oo ka mid ah axkaanta iyo qeyrkoodba) oo uu sugaa (wuxuu doono oo ka mid ah), Agtiisana waxaa ah asalka Kitaabka 20.
arabic: يَمۡحُواْ ٱللَّهُ مَا يَشَآءُ وَيُثۡبِتُۖ وَعِندَهُۥٓ أُمُّ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ
footnotes: 20.Waa Looxa Maxfuudka oo ay ku qoran yihiin asalka Kitaab kasta uu Alle soo waxyooday iyo wax kasta oo Alle qaddaray.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yamḥū al-lahu mā yashāu wayuth'bitu waʿindahu ummu al-kitābi
